heading: Internationalization in SvelteKit
body_text: This is a small example to demonstrate i18n functionality in SvelteKit using typesafe-i18n library. typesafe-i18n is a fully type-safe and lightweight internationalization library for all your TypeScript and JavaScript projects. typesafe-i18n comes with an API that allows other services to read and update translations. Total number of npm downloads per week as of {date:Date|simpleDate} are {download:number|simpleNumber}.
